tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Mr. Taggart is one of the most compassionate professors I\'ve had at PCC. He can be long winded but he means well. He truly creates an environment which allows one to grow as an artist. I highly recommend him.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He doesn\'t give tips on how to do something, he just expects you to know. Due dates are the worst because everyone pins up their work (this is the nice part) and then as a class you talk about each piece. That\'s the worst because he expects to spend a minimum of 10 minutes on each person\'s work and in a class of 25, this was torture. Would not take

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is one of the best art teachers I\'ve ever had. He is a great artist, passionate about art. He use to teach at Otis. He\'s not the type of teacher that does demos or shows you how to draw, but he gives you feedbacks and what you should do.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Nick was an awesome teacher. He was genuinely passionate about art and was great about critiquing. He works with you on your level, with me, he pushed me really hard because I was a little more advanced and my portfolio is now awesome because of it. The art center was thoroughly impressed with the work I created in his class under his guidance.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Nick was a great professor, he was helpful and he involved use of different media in most of his assignments, he encouraged to be your own artist rather than imitating others, but at the same time used Van Gogh in an ink assignment...He\'s funny and down to earth, and he\'s really passionate about the arts.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Nick is amazing, he is so talented and seriously passionate about art. The class is structured well and we have reasonable time to complete projects. Overall it was a fantastic class and Nick is wonderful. He also has incredibly good skin!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Mr.Taggart is a great artist himself and gives you lots of personal input on your art pieces and really pushes the best out of you. Easy going and passionate! The best!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His class was fun to attend. No stress. Therefore, I could focus on my project and got an "A." Thanks!
